GSD.description:
virtio_console: Assure used length from device is limited

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.52 by commit f6ec306b93dc600a0ab3bb2693568ef1cc5f7f7a. For more details please see the references link.
